mdx:
<TextFormatter
	insertions={[
		{
			text: "{INTRO}",
			replacement: <Tablature notes="La canción se toca con el capo en el traste 3" />,
		},
		{
			text: "{PUNTEO}",
			replacement: (
				<ProtectedComponent withoutBlockContainer>
					<ImageWithLink src={DATA.song.assets.punteo} width={500} height={277} />
				</ProtectedComponent>
			),
		},
	]}
>
	{DATA.song.parsedLyrics}
</TextFormatter>
